title: my right click is not working in game!!!?
body: I dont know what to do, I was in a game and suddently my right click stopped working.. I tried changing mouses and even tried my trackpad.. Plz help me!!

replies.body: my right click in start work but after 5 minutes stop working, i change mouse but still dont work pls if u can fix it
Yes my right click works outside the game but as soon as I get in-game it stops working and I cant move.. I swapped my mouse with 4 different one now and it still doesnt work..
Is your right click working outside of game?  Can you try swapping your mouse to see if it will work then?  This will help us determine if the issue is with the mouse.  Let me know!
